pkgmetadata.longdescription: What is NextPCG? Fast Track to Game Content Generation To meet the growing demand for immersive games with vast amounts of content, game developers can use a procedural approach with NextPCG to create high-quality games efficiently, while meeting deadlines and containing costs. NextPCG is a cloud-based solution that enhances game engines' AIGC and procedural content generation capabilities. It provides comprehensive toolsets for creating game content out-of-the-box, along with an efficient pipeline and the ability to generate Vastworlds. The NextPCG Features - Provide rich out-of-the-box toolsets for game content generation. - Provide a product standard efficient pipeline for open-world game levels generation. - Support one-click Vastworlds generation through a cloud-based platform.
